questions: How many people are there in Yiwu?
article: Hello,everyone!I'm Belinda.Welcome  to Yiwu. Yiwu is my hometown . It's a big and beautiful international  city. There are more than 2,000,000 people in Yiwu.There are four seasons here,spring, summer,autumn and winter.Spring is warm.Summer is hot. Autumn is cool and winter is cold. I like autumn because it's cool .And in autumn I can eat many fruits like bananas, apples oranges and so on .Bananas are my favourite fruit.
